Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2008 04:50AM sunshine43 wrote: hello everyone, i am new to this.  my last chemo was 3/12/08.  i started with white fuzz 1 week after my last treatment.  it is now 3 weeks after last treatment and i have about 1/2 inch of white hair.  it is really white.  at this point i am just thankful it is coming in.  i have colored my hair for about 25 years so i never really knew what color it would come in.  friends at work say if it is a pretty gray, leave it. hope you are all doing well sunshine43
Posts.Title: If Your Hair Grows in Gray or White figsgirls Diana63
